column5: Home is close to the city center, parks, art & culture, and restaurants and dining. Youâ€™ll love how central home is to Hill Country & Downtown San Antonio. Easy access to IH-10. SA Int Airport 7 miles, Riverwalk 5 miles, Lackland just over 10 miles  Within 10-20 minutes of The Pearl, Northstar Mall, La Cantera Shopping, Fiesta Texas, Riverwalk, The Rim, The Quarry, Downtown, Leon Springs and Boerne. . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
